title: Elon Musk and Twitter Executives May Still Fight in Court
description: Disputes over compensation and firings, and potentially over layoffs, could push both sides into fresh legal battles.
dc:creator: Andrew Ross Sorkin, Ravi Mattu, Bernhard Warner, Sarah Kessler, Stephen Gandel, Michael J. de la Merced, Lauren Hirsch and Ephrat Livni
